title: Healin' Good  Pretty Cure 追加戰士的聲優已出爐

replies.msg:
It appears Asumi/Cure Earth will be voiced by Suzuko Mimori!!!

Mimorin also voiced popular characters such as Umi from Love Live, Hikari from Shoujo☆Kageki Revue Starlight, and Sherlock from Milky Holmes!
(來源：twitter的 Healin'♡Hibiki⭐Hello~!!!!，另維基百科有關完美治癒♥光之美少女、三森鈴子版面的資料都已改)

值得一提，三森是第一位演出光之美少女的LoveLive聲優。
